page.title: 11The Mayor.
page.content: Councillor Embling represents this community on the Ogwr Borough Council and this year he has been our Mayor. He was born in Heol-y-Cyw and was a pupil at this school from 1929 to 1935. At 14 years of age he left school to train as a bricklayer. Four years later he became a miner and began to take an interest in community activities. He has been very active in all aspects of community life and for the last 10 years he has served as our Councillor. He is the Vice-Chairman of the School Governors and has been very active in the life of the school. His knowledge of the area has been very helpful to us in our research for this project. (Group C.) C.W.
